snippet: Three important weapons bills reach the Senate floor over strong Republican opposition. The need is urgent to give them an up-or-down vote.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that Senate Judiciary Committee has finally produced three major bills that could each make significant difference in lowering number and firepower of guns and keeping them out of wrong hands; fears bills may not be able to get 60 votes necessary to overcome expected Republican filibusters.
lead_paragraph: Three important weapons bills reach the Senate floor over strong Republican opposition. The need is urgent to give them an up-or-down vote.
